sentences.en: At length , the day broke , resplendent, cloudless.
sentences.cn: 后来天破晓了,光辉灿烂, 万里无云.

sentences.en: Bessie, resplendent in royal blue velvet, was hovering beside the table.
sentences.cn: 贝茜身穿华丽的深蓝色天鹅绒衣服，在桌旁徘徊。

sentences.en: He glimpsed Sonia, resplendent in a red dress.
sentences.cn: 他瞥了索尼亚一眼，见她一身红衣，光彩照人。

sentences.en: He used elaborate sentences, carefully balanced , and obsolete, resplendent words.
sentences.cn: 他的句子精心雕琢, 用词讲究对仗, 好用废字,华丽的字.

sentences.en: Her beauty was never more resplendent than when she cast a parting glamor at the youth.
sentences.cn: 最后,她向年轻人瞥了一眼,她从未有过象向他投过这一瞥时那么楚楚动人了.

sentences.en: Palaces within the Forbidden City are grand and resplendent.
sentences.cn: 紫禁城内的殿宇,金碧辉煌,异常雄伟.

sentences.en: Ted was resplendent in his best grey suit.
sentences.cn: 特德穿着他最好的灰色礼服,光彩夺目.

sentences.en: The East China Sea of sunrise of an added ingredient, resplendent.
sentences.cn: 引子日出东海, 光芒四射.

sentences.en: The queen was resplendent with jewels.
sentences.cn: 那皇后浑身上下珠光宝气.

sentences.en: There are buildings that feature.'s Exposure under the sun even more resplendent.
sentences.cn: 还有那楼房的特色. 在阳光的照射下显得格外金碧辉煌.

sentences.en: To Catherine, Morris appeared more resplendent.
sentences.cn: 在凯瑟琳看来, 莫里斯更加神采奕奕了.

sentences.en: Viewed from afar, Potala Palace looks lofty, resplendent and majestic.
sentences.cn: 远远望去, 布达拉宫高耸入云, 金碧辉煌,巍峨壮观.

sentences.en: We are enjoying the resplendent colors of the shanghai the autumn.
sentences.cn: 让我们一起欣赏上海秋天里的瑰丽色彩.

sentences.en: Yellow tile coping, under sunlight resplendent in gold and jade green.
sentences.cn: 黄琉璃瓦盖顶, 阳光下金碧辉煌.

sentences.en: You are resplendent with light , more majestic than mountains rich with game.
sentences.cn: 4你从有野食之山而来, 有光华和荣美.

trans.tran_cn: 华丽灿烂的，辉煌的，靡丽，光芒万丈，鲜艳夺目
trans.tran_en: very beautiful, bright, and impressive in appearance
